title: Track Awesome Preact Updates Weekly

items.title: Awesome Preact Updates on May 01 - May 07, 2023
items.summary: 26 awesome projects updated on May 01 - May 07, 2023
items.content_text:
### Contents / Example Apps

*   [Play.cash](https://play.cash) :notes: *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê92)](https://github.com/feross/play.cash))*
*   [Songsterr](https://www.songsterr.com) üéº Using Preact X in production since 10.0 alpha
*   [BitMidi](https://bitmidi.com/) üéπ Wayback machine for free MIDI files *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê588)](https://github.com/feross/bitmidi.com))*
*   [Ultimate Guitar](https://www.ultimate-guitar.com) üé∏speed boosted by Preact.
*   [ESBench](http://esbench.com) is built using Preact.
*   [BigWebQuiz](https://bigwebquiz.com) *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê109)](https://github.com/jakearchibald/big-web-quiz))*
*   [Nectarine.rocks](http://nectarine.rocks) *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê62)](https://github.com/developit/nectarine))* :peach:
*   [OSS.Ninja](https://oss.ninja) *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê147)](https://github.com/developit/oss.ninja))*
*   [GuriVR](https://gurivr.com) *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê194)](https://github.com/opennewslabs/guri-vr))*
*   [Offline Gallery](https://use-the-platform.com/offline-gallery/) *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê95)](https://github.com/vaneenige/offline-gallery/))* :balloon:
*   [Periodic Weather](https://use-the-platform.com/periodic-weather/) *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê58)](https://github.com/vaneenige/periodic-weather/))* :sunny:
*   [Rugby News Board](http://nbrugby.com) *[(GitHub Project) (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/rugby-board/rugby-board-node)*
*   [Preact Gallery](https://preact.gallery/) an 8KB photo gallery PWA built using Preact.
*   [Rainbow Explorer](https://use-the-platform.com/rainbow-explorer/) Preact app to translate real life color to digital color *([Github project (‚≠ê27)](https://github.com/vaneenige/rainbow-explorer))*.
*   [YASCC](https://carlosqsilva.github.io/YASCC/#/) Yet Another SoundCloud Client *([Github project (‚≠ê35)](https://github.com/carlosqsilva/YASCC))*.
*   [Journalize](https://preact-journal.herokuapp.com/) 14k offline-capable journaling PWA using preact. *([Github project (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/jpodwys/preact-journal))*.
*   [Proxx](https://proxx.app) A game of proximity by GoogleChromeLabs using preact. *([Github project (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/GoogleChromeLabs/proxx))*.
*   [Web Maker](https://webmaker.app) An offline and blazing fast frontend playground built using Preact. *([Github project (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/chinchang/web-maker))*.
*   [Intergram](https://www.intergram.xyz) A live chat widget linked to your Telegram messenger built using Preact. *([Github project (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/idoco/intergram))*.
*   [Preact App in ES6 without Babel or JSX](https://vanilla-preact.surge.sh) *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/safdarjamal/vanilla-preact/))*.
*   [GHFresh](https://code2k.github.io/ghfresh/) Monitor GitHub repository releases ‚Äì Prerendering with Preact. Built with Preact Compat, TypeScript, Material-UI and Redux Toolkit. *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/code2k/ghfresh))*.
*   [Passwords Fountain](https://passwords-fountain.com/) - modern & performant password manager interface which works everywhere *([Github project (‚≠ê64)](https://github.com/kolodziejczakM/passwords-fountain))*.
*   [macOS Web](https://macos-preact.now.sh) - macOS Big Sur Desktop experience for Web, built with Preact and Vite *([Github project (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/PuruVJ/macos-preact))*.
*   [Cinemate](https://cinemate.me) - Movie Recommender System built with Preact and TypeScript. Backend written in Rust.
*   [Windows 11 Web](https://win11.vercel.app) - Awe-amazing Windows 11 clone for the web! ‚ö° *([Github project (‚≠ê587)](https://github.com/PiyushSuthar/Windows-11-Web))*.
*   [Idea Keeper](https://miftikcz.github.io/idea-keeper-2) :brain: Highly extensible and minimalistic idea keeping app *([GitHub Project (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/MiftikCZ/idea-keeper-2))*.

items.title: Awesome Preact Updates on Jun 06 - Jun 12, 2022
items.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Jun 06 - Jun 12, 2022
items.content_text:
### Contents / Boilerplates

*   [Preact Neutralino TypeScript Starter (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/ernest-rudnicki/preact-neutralino-typescript-starter) - Starter project for building lightweight desktop applications with Preact and neutralino.js.

### Contents / Components

*   [Preact Compat (‚≠ê947)](https://github.com/preactjs/preact-compat) - Use any React library with Preact *([full example (‚≠ê54)](https://github.com/developit/preact-compat-example))*.
*   [Preact Render To String (‚≠ê685)](https://github.com/preactjs/preact-render-to-string) - Universal rendering.
*   [Preact Markup (‚≠ê204)](https://github.com/developit/preact-markup) - Render HTML & Custom Elements as JSX & Components.
*   [Preact Portal (‚≠ê181)](https://github.com/developit/preact-portal) - Render Preact components into (a) SPACE.
*   [Preact Richtextarea (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/developit/preact-richtextarea) - Simple HTML editor component.
*   [Preact Cycle (‚≠ê139)](https://github.com/developit/preact-cycle) - Functional-reactive paradigm for Preact.
*   [Preact MUI (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/luisvinicius167/preact-mui) - The MUI CSS Preact library.
*   [Preact MDL (‚≠ê189)](https://github.com/developit/preact-mdl) - Use [MDL](https://getmdl.io) as Preact components.
*   [Preact Photon (‚≠ê179)](https://github.com/developit/preact-photon) - Build beautiful desktop UI with [photon](http://photonkit.com).

### Contents / Testing Utils

*   [Preact JSX Chai (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/developit/preact-jsx-chai) - JSX assertion testing *(no DOM, right in Node)*.
items.content_html:
Contents / Boilerplates

  • Preact Neutralino TypeScript Starter (‚≠ê2) - Starter project for building lightweight desktop applications with Preact and neutralino.js.

Contents / Components

  • Preact Compat (‚≠ê947) - Use any React library with Preact (full example (‚≠ê54)).
  • Preact Render To String (‚≠ê685) - Universal rendering.
  • Preact Markup (‚≠ê204) - Render HTML & Custom Elements as JSX & Components.
  • Preact Portal (‚≠ê181) - Render Preact components into (a) SPACE.
  • Preact Richtextarea (‚≠ê43) - Simple HTML editor component.
  • Preact Cycle (‚≠ê139) - Functional-reactive paradigm for Preact.
  • Preact MUI (‚≠ê37) - The MUI CSS Preact library.
  • Preact MDL (‚≠ê189) - Use MDL as Preact components.
  • Preact Photon (‚≠ê179) - Build beautiful desktop UI with photon.

Contents / Testing Utils

  • Preact JSX Chai (‚≠ê56) - JSX assertion testing (no DOM, right in Node).

items.title: Awesome Preact Updates on Jul 24 - Jul 30, 2017
items.summary: 22 awesome projects updated on Jul 24 - Jul 30, 2017
items.content_text:
### Contents / Boilerplates

*   [Official Boilerplate (‚≠ê964)](https://github.com/developit/preact-boilerplate) - Ready-to-rock Preact starter project, powered by Webpack.
*   [Preact Simple Starter (‚≠ê64)](https://github.com/ooade/PreactSimpleStarter) - PWA Simple Starter with Preact, Preact-mdl and Webpack2.
*   [Preact PWA (‚≠ê512)](https://github.com/ezekielchentnik/preact-pwa) - PWA focused on raw performance, server side rendering, prerendering, redux, express, rollup.

### Contents / Routing

*   [Preact Router (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/developit/preact-router) - URL router for Preact.

### Contents / Components

*   [Preact Token Input (‚≠ê63)](https://github.com/developit/preact-token-input) - Text field that tokenizes input, for things like tags.
*   [Preact Virtual List (‚≠ê228)](https://github.com/developit/preact-virtual-list) - Easily render lists with millions of rows ([demo](https://jsfiddle.net/developit/qqan9pdo/)).
*   [Preact Layout](https://download.github.io/preact-layout/) - Small and simple layout library.
*   [Preact Socrates (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/matthewmueller/preact-socrates) - Preact plugin for [Socrates (‚≠ê576)](http://github.com/matthewmueller/socrates).
*   [Preact Flyd (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/xialvjun/preact-flyd) - Use [flyd (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/paldepind/flyd) FRP streams in Preact + JSX.
*   [Preact I18nline (‚≠ê38)](https://github.com/download/preact-i18nline) - Integrates the ecosystem around [i18n-js (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/everydayhero/i18n-js) with Preact via [i18nline (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/download/i18nline).
*   [Preact Classless Component (‚≠ê44)](https://github.com/ld0rman/preact-classless-component) - Create preact components without the class keyword.
*   [Preact Hyperscript (‚≠ê33)](https://github.com/queckezz/preact-hyperscript) - Hyperscript-like syntax for creating elements.
*   [Shallow Compare (‚≠ê34)](https://github.com/tkh44/shallow-compare) - Simplified `shouldComponentUpdate` helper.
*   [Preact Codemod (‚≠ê40)](https://github.com/vutran/preact-codemod) - Transform your React code to Preact.
*   [Preact Helmet (‚≠ê85)](https://github.com/download/preact-helmet) - A document head manager for Preact.
*   [Preact Delegate (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/NekR/preact-delegate) - Delegate DOM events.
*   [Preact No SSR (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/gufsky/preact-no-ssr) - Skip Server Side Rendering of Components.

### Contents / Articles

*   [Building a Small PWA with Preact and Firebase](https://dandenney.com/posts/front-end-dev/building-a-small-pwa-with-preact-and-firebase)
*   [Authentication with Auth0](https://auth0.com/blog/preact-authentication-tutorial)

### Contents / Example Apps

*   [Colors App (‚≠ê98)](https://github.com/lukeed/colors-app) - PWA for copying values from popular color palettes. Supports HEX, RGB, and HSL formats.
*   [Tracks (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/jordic/tracks_preact/) - PWA for tracking things in general. Gdrive Sync.

### Contents / Related Libraries

*   [Rax (‚≠ê8k)](https://github.com/alibaba/rax) - A universal React-compatible render engine.
items.content_html:
Contents / Boilerplates

  • Official Boilerplate (‚≠ê964) - Ready-to-rock Preact starter project, powered by Webpack.
  • Preact Simple Starter (‚≠ê64) - PWA Simple Starter with Preact, Preact-mdl and Webpack2.
  • Preact PWA (‚≠ê512) - PWA focused on raw performance, server side rendering, prerendering, redux, express, rollup.

Contents / Routing

  • Preact Router (‚≠ê1k) - URL router for Preact.

Contents / Components

  • Preact Token Input (‚≠ê63) - Text field that tokenizes input, for things like tags.
  • Preact Virtual List (‚≠ê228) - Easily render lists with millions of rows (demo).
  • Preact Layout - Small and simple layout library.
  • Preact Socrates (‚≠ê16) - Preact plugin for Socrates (‚≠ê576).
  • Preact Flyd (‚≠ê11) - Use flyd (‚≠ê1.6k) FRP streams in Preact + JSX.
  • Preact I18nline (‚≠ê38) - Integrates the ecosystem around i18n-js (‚≠ê10) with Preact via i18nline (‚≠ê19).
  • Preact Classless Component (‚≠ê44) - Create preact components without the class keyword.
  • Preact Hyperscript (‚≠ê33) - Hyperscript-like syntax for creating elements.
  • Shallow Compare (‚≠ê34) - Simplified shouldComponentUpdate helper.
  • Preact Codemod (‚≠ê40) - Transform your React code to Preact.
  • Preact Helmet (‚≠ê85) - A document head manager for Preact.
  • Preact Delegate (‚≠ê19) - Delegate DOM events.
  • Preact No SSR (‚≠ê8) - Skip Server Side Rendering of Components.

Contents / Articles

  • Building a Small PWA with Preact and Firebase
  • Authentication with Auth0

Contents / Example Apps

  • Colors App (‚≠ê98) - PWA for copying values from popular color palettes. Supports HEX, RGB, and HSL formats.
  • Tracks (‚≠ê16) - PWA for tracking things in general. Gdrive Sync.

Contents / Related Libraries

  • Rax (‚≠ê8k) - A universal React-compatible render engine.

items.title: Awesome Preact Updates on Apr 17 - Apr 23, 2017
items.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Apr 17 - Apr 23, 2017
items.content_text:
### Contents / Boilerplates

*   [Preact Offline Starter (‚≠ê387)](https://github.com/lukeed/preact-starter) - Webpack2 boilerplate for building SPA / PWA / offline front-end apps with Preact.
*   [TypeScript Preact Starter (‚≠ê51)](https://github.com/nickytonline/ts-preact-starter) - Barebones starter project for Preact with TypeScript.
*   [Preact Redux SSR Example (‚≠ê32)](https://github.com/csbun/preact-redux-ssr-example) - Server-side Rendering with Redux Example.

### Contents / Components

*   [Preact Scroll Header (‚≠ê42)](https://github.com/lukeed/preact-scroll-header) - A (800b gzip) header that will show/hide while scrolling for Preact.
*   [Preact Progress (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/lukeed/preact-progress) - Simple and lightweight (\~590 bytes gzip) progress bar component for Preact.

### Contents / Articles

*   [The Inner Workings of Virtual DOM](https://medium.com/@rajaraodv/the-inner-workings-of-virtual-dom-666ee7ad47cf)
*   [Using Preact Instead of React](https://medium.com/@rajaraodv/using-preact-instead-of-react-70f40f53107c)
*   [Preact Internals #1: The Easy Parts](https://medium.com/@asolove/preact-internals-1-the-easy-parts-3a081fa36205#.twnc3doig)
*   [Preact Internals #2: The Component Model](https://medium.com/@asolove/preact-internals-2-the-component-model-36a05e32957b#.8zyec2y9v)

### Contents / Example Apps

*   [Preact HN (‚≠ê296)](https://github.com/kristoferbaxter/preact-hn) - Demonstration of Preact used to build Hacker News as a PWA.
*   [TodoMVC (‚≠ê105)](https://github.com/developit/preact-todomvc) - TodoMVC done in Preact. Under 6kb and fast.
items.content_html:
Contents / Boilerplates

  • Preact Offline Starter (‚≠ê387) - Webpack2 boilerplate for building SPA / PWA / offline front-end apps with Preact.
  • TypeScript Preact Starter (‚≠ê51) - Barebones starter project for Preact with TypeScript.
  • Preact Redux SSR Example (‚≠ê32) - Server-side Rendering with Redux Example.

Contents / Components

  • Preact Scroll Header (‚≠ê42) - A (800b gzip) header that will show/hide while scrolling for Preact.
  • Preact Progress (‚≠ê49) - Simple and lightweight (~590 bytes gzip) progress bar component for Preact.

Contents / Articles

  • The Inner Workings of Virtual DOM
  • Using Preact Instead of React
  • Preact Internals #1: The Easy Parts
  • Preact Internals #2: The Component Model

Contents / Example Apps

  • Preact HN (‚≠ê296) - Demonstration of Preact used to build Hacker News as a PWA.
  • TodoMVC (‚≠ê105) - TodoMVC done in Preact. Under 6kb and fast.
